titleStmt.title: (A key to the colourization may be found at: http://oracc.museum.upenn.edu/doc/user/teicolours.html.)X301112 = AD -111B

w.lemma: Bāb-mār-rubê[Gateof the Son of the Prince//Gate of the Son of the Prince]N

p.span: [...] of day [it cleared] from south to nor[th ...]

[Month III, the 1st (of which followed the 30th of the preceding month), ... mea]sured. Night of the 1st, first sic part of the night, Venus was 20 fingers above α Tauri. Ni[ght ...]

[...] The 12th?, ZI IR. The 13th, moonset to sunrise: 4°, measured (despite) mist; [lunar] eclipse [...]
[...] sunrise to moonset: 11°, measured; the north wind which was set to the west side blew. The 10+[xth, ...]

[...] ... That month, (there was) an attack of the Arabs as before. The general, the [...]

[Month V, the 1st (of which followed the 30th of the preceding month), ... (the moon) was] low to the sun; the moon was 2 cubits in front of α Virginis, the moon being 2 cubits high to the north. The 1st, last appearance of Saturn in Virgo [...]
